0.cdata!:
Burundi - Projet pilote d'aide au
            secteur national de la construction

abstracts.cdata!:
The major components of the Local
            Construction Industry Pilot Project for Burundi include: (a)
            a credit program to finance the construction of two
            limekilns and the purchase of equipment for brick-makers and
            construction enterprises; (b) technical and/or managerial
            assistance to promoters of limekilns, brick-makers and local
            construction companies; (c) technical assistance to the
            ministry of public works, energy, and mining; (d) plantation
            of eucalyptus trees; and (e) feasibility studies.
